title: organizar as varias abas de acordo com minhas necessidades
content:
normalmente entro no site e abro varias abas, depois coloco as abas na ordem que quero acessa-las. agora não estou conseguindo arrastar as abas. existe uma TOTALMENTE INÚTIL opção de mover abas que somente possue as opções de ir pro inicio, pro fim, e nova janela. eu gostaria de mover as abas 8 a 18, para a posição 6, se assim for interessante.

entenda as atas 8 a 18 foram abertas para analise de interesse, elas podem ser desprezadas, ou colocadas junto a alguma que possa ter o mesmo assunto.

imagino que deva ter um about config que possa voltar isto
creator: joao.azul

title: Need to Open Word files, not save them
content: One of the reasons I use Firefox is because I have always had the option of being able to open Word documents without saving them. This is important to me because I often have to quickly scan a document but do not need to save a copy of it. With the new update when I click on download a Word document it sends me to save with no option to open it instead. Say it isn't so because this is so important to me I will switch to Chrome or another browser after using Firefox for years. BTW I go under Applications in "Settings, General" and Word files are not listed as an option for me to change how they are handled when clicked on. I'm using Windows 10 and Outlook (web version).
creator: pamelalehto

title: Search engine options
content: Will Mozilla Firefox add Brave Search as an option in the future?
creator: rdm1221

title: downloading csv files to save as excel files
content: Late last week, something changed in Firefox browser. I used to download csv files and Firefox would open them with the option to save as an excel file. Now it does not. I have to save it as csv then convert it to excel. It also doesn't seem to save my settings on the website I'm downloading from - I always have to manipulate the settings before downloading. It is a huge headache and I have resorted to using Chrome instead.
creator: tkirl

title: Downloaded firefox but says Advanced Security blocked access to www.searchbaron.com
content: There is a virus imbeded in the download for Firefox. I get a warning that Advanced Security blocked access to www.searchbaron.com. I am warned not to download Firefox. The virus is not in my computer but I get a warning when i download Firefox and try to use the browser. Virus is in the browser not on my computer. Fix please.
creator: nriffle

title: changes to file download locations in version 98
content:
Re: Changes to how file downloads are handled in Firefox version 98: Personally I don't consider this an enhancement. Since I upgraded to v98, every file I open online, even if I'm not saving it, is saving a copy of itself onto my desktop. (To be precise, D:\OneDrive\Desktop). And I look at up to 20 files per day, so this is getting pretty annoying.

My regular downloads directory still exists, and that should be where temporary copies of files are being stored prior to my closing or saving them (right?). But it's empty.

Note that under Settings > General > Downloads, the default is set to Always Ask rather than one specific directory. However I believe that is for the "permanent" version of the files, not the temporary version.

How do I get Firefox to revert back to the pre-98 defaults for the temporary versions of files? I was hoping this change was a mistake but I see that 98.01 did not fix it and from the article referenced above, it looks like changes were made deliberately. And the desktop is clearly not a place where temporary files should be being placed.

Thanks.
creator: babyrd

title: Firefox crash help/advice_ updated to new version_Firefox no longer opens_Windows 7 Pro
content:
Hi, Would like suggestions on how to make FireFox work again as it will not open now. Need to access urls with autofill login, security, etc. for business purposes on my laptop computer (this is my desktop computer).

support.mozilla does not seem to provide fixes/suggestion that are specific to my issue.

Background: - Firefox flaky on a couple of sites to autofill username and password login info - downloaded latest version of FireFox on 03.14.22 - selected install - firefox did not re-open, selected Firefox under Program Files and dialog box of file path not valid - restarted computer & Firefox no longer under Program Files - cannot open Firefox & no other Browser loaded onto computer - not able to attach crash file from folder of profile….
